Original meaning 本义: Meaning clear and still water

澂字的基本解释

澂
chéng
同“澄1”。

澂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chéng］
［《廣韻》直陵切，平蒸，澄。］
“澄1”的古字。
水清而静。亦谓澄清，把事情弄清楚。

澂字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澂； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页651第22
【唐韻】直陵切【集韻】【韻會】持陵切，?音懲。【揚子·方言】淸也。【後漢·儒林贊】千載不作，淵源誰澂。　又澂江，郡名。【廣輿記】雲南澂江府，古滇國地。【集韻】或作瀓，亦作澄。

澂字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

澂字的起名意思

暂无。

Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chéng］
["Guangyun" cut straight tombs, steamed flat, and clear. ]
"Cheng 1" is an ancient word.
The water is clear and quiet. It is also called clarification, to make things clear.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　澂; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 651 22
[Tang Yun] Zhiling and cutting [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Holding tomb and cutting, sound punishment. [Yangtze Dialect] Cheong Ye. [Later Han·Rulin praise] If you haven't done it for thousands of years, who is the origin.　You Shengjiang, the name of the county. 【Guangyu Ji】Chenjiang Mansion, Yunnan, the land of ancient Dian. 【Jiyun】Or as 瀓, also as clarification.
